Texts.Chs: 随着你的养蜂技术的发展，你的蜜蜂农场所产出的蜂蜜将会^orange;越来越多^reset;。
Texts.Eng: As your bee-tech gets more advanced you'll get ^orange;superior output^reset; from your bee farm.

Texts.Chs: 从^orange;蜂巢^reset;中可以提炼出又好吃又营养的蜂蜜。这时你首先需要的是建造一台^orange;木制蜂蜜离心机^reset;，记住这时蜂蜜专用的离心机而不是实验室用的那种。
Texts.Eng: To extract the goodies from ^orange;honeycombs^reset; produced by your bees, you are going to need a ^orange;wooden centrifuge^reset;, but not the sort you use in a lab.
